name: iPal: Tic Tac Toe
description:
Feeling bored and not ready to mingle with real people? Not to worry because your iPal virtual friend can entertain you with Tic Tac Toe.

Play Tic Tac Toe in three levels – easy, medium and hard. Simple as it but this game is fun and entertaining. It can keep you busy when you don’t have anything important to do.

Many of us want a constant companion whether at work, at home or wherever we go and getting iPal is the best gift you can give yourself right now.

Already a fan of iPal? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:
